official_title: To authorize and request the President to proclaim the 6th of July 1991 as Louis "Satchmo" Armstrong Day; a day to observe and commemorate the ninety-first anniversary of his birth.

summary.text: Designates July 6, 1991, as Louis "Satchmo" Armstrong Day.
